definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Further eytogenetic analysis and breeding utilization of this intergeneric hybrid are still being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前正進一步開展細胞遺傳和育種利用研究。

sentences.english: These results provided the genetic foundation for the breeding of V. volvacea.
sentences.chinese: 這些研究結果爲草菇的育種提供了科學依據。

sentences.english: The single grain selection is better for the preharvest sprouting rate in the selective breeding application.
sentences.chinese: 在選擇育種中，田間穗上發芽率以單粒選爲好。

sentences.english: Dwarf is one of the major target traits in soybean breeding.
sentences.chinese: 矮稈是大豆育種的重要目標性狀之一。

sentences.english: Frankling, Eleanore. Practical Dog Breeding and Genetics .
Moreover, some achievements in BYDV-resistant variety breeding are discussed and future research directions are advanced.
sentences.chinese: 指出抗黃矮病育種的成就並提出未來的研究方向。

sentences.english: The new variety of netted melon Ruilong is bred by a hybrid and an inbred line.
sentences.chinese: 應用三交種育種技術培育出網紋甜瓜新品種“瑞龍”。

sentences.english: A batch of excellent germplasm resources were obtained by selection, which can be applied to quality breeding in adzuki bean.
sentences.chinese: 篩選出一批優異種質資源可應用於小豆品質育種。

sentences.english: The approach to breeding super rice was also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對超級稻的育種路線進行了討論。

sentences.english: Using the heterosis is one of the important ways in breeding cultivars.
sentences.chinese: 利用雜種優勢是作物育種重要途徑之一。

sentences.english: Germplasm resources resistant to pests is the base of breeding resistant varieties.
sentences.chinese: 抗蟲種質資源是進行農作物抗蟲育種的基礎。

sentences.english: Resistant genes are material basis for wheat breeding.
sentences.chinese: 抗源材料是小麥育種的物質基礎。

sentences.english: Some will also be entered into a 'pre-breeding' programme.
sentences.chinese: 一些品種還將進入一個“預育種”項目中。

sentences.english: Application of individual plant selection method known as the system breeding.
sentences.chinese: 應用單株選擇的方法稱爲系統育種。

sentences.english: Now, polyploid breeding is a commonly used method in crop breeding.
sentences.chinese: 而多倍體育種是近代作物育種常採用的一種方法。

sentences.chinese: 而多倍體育種是近代作物育種常採用的一種方法。
